name: Rookie Jr.'s 60's Diner
description:
Rookie Jr.'s 60's Diner is a very short visual novel with tower defense elements. You play as Colin, the overworked manager of the diner, who has just been informed that celebrity chef Martin Florentino is coming to visit the restaurant for a TV show. Do your best to keep him out... but nothing gets past Martin!

This was made for the PIGSquad Summer Slow Jams for August 2022. Theme: Boss Fight! Subtheme: Dreams and Nightmares!
